name: No Witches Allowed
description:
No Witches Allowed is a game about being the Grand Inquisitor in the medieval times. That means you should search for witches and heretics avoiding burning innocent people on the stake. 

Game consists of 7 days, in which you should decide fates of accused people: free, jail or execute them. In finding evidence of misdeeds (or not) you have from 1 to 4 inquisitors in your disposal.

Your inquisitors can be advanced if you do good in eyes of the Church.

Or they can be killed if you will bring a lot of harm to innocent people. 

Balance of the City lies in your hands.

Hello. We are a small team from Russia who make their attempts in jam with a sincere dream to make a game.

This game was made by:

Code — Kirill Titov, Nikita Radostev

Narrative — Egor Kislyakov, Nikita Radostev, Irina Torova

Art —big kudos to Google and color backgrounds in this search

and this cool city generator

Music — tracks from "Ask Again"

And a big Thank you for Ink to the great team inkle!

#inkjam18
